title: <mark>5 Non-Negotiables</mark> <mark>for a Calm but Powerful Life</mark>
items: Protect your morning routine — the first 60 minutes decide the whole day.
Prioritize sleep and recovery — seven hours is a performance baseline, not optional.
Practice decisive boundaries — say no fast so you can say yes well.
Do a daily 10-minute reflection — clarity compounds faster than effort.
Move every day and control your breath — steady energy beats frantic hustle.
